tag_list: denver-web-design, nj-web-design, las-vegas-web-design, houston-web-design, seattle-web-design, tampa-web-design, albuquerque-web-design
overview:
Dan Collins User Experience Architect (UX) / Conversion Specialist

I am a Usability Certified Web Designer and Front-End Developer. “Design is a plan for arranging elements in such a way as best to accomplish a particular purpose”. I have been designing and coding valid and semantic XHTML, CSS that is both clean and SEO-friendly, since 1998.

My services offered are focused on creative, effective, and efficient design. I specialize in creative usable designs with valid, table-less, and accessible HTML, CSS. I come alongside my clients, and form a long-term working relationship, to help them succeed.

I do this by helping them to reach their brand’s full potential through online branding and utilizing the Internet. I’m a freelance designer & developer based in the Denver, Colorado metro area. I invite you to browse through some of my recent projects to help you get the feel for the style that I have as a designer
